english_example_sentence: If the guests like hot coffee, we will offer it to them.
russian_example_sentence: Если гостям понравится горячий кофе, мы им предложим.
turkish_example_sentence: Misafirler sıcak kahveyi sevseler, onlara ikram ederiz.
